cyclone.name: NICOLE
cyclone.current_location: about 495 mi east of the northwestern Bahamas
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to slow, then turn west-southwest toward the northwestern Bahamas and the east coast of Florida through Wednesdayâ€“Thursday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: northwestern Bahamas then east coast of Florida

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch: Northwestern Bahamas and the east coast of Florida from Volusia/Brevard County Line to Hallandale Beach, including Lake Okeechobee. Tropical-storm-force watches extend north to Altamaha Sound, GA and south of Hallandale Beach to north of Ocean Reef.
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northwestern Bahamas, east coast of Florida, and portions of the southeastern United States coastline
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at St. Croix; only occasional squalls or breezy conditions possible.
weather_observation.rainfall: No heavy rainfall of concern expected at St. Croix.
